note:
Coffee, motorcycles, music, microcontrollers, and Oxford commas. 3D printer, laser cutter, and cnc mill owner (with no real skills).  I like to pretend I’m a geek, not a nerd.

Turns out I don't seem to talk much coffee or motorcycles here. (Not entirely sure why? I do motorcycles pretty comprehensively on web forums, but I guess I'm not geeking about coffee much online these days.)

So mostly non-gaming geek stuff, infosec, privacy, music.

fields.name: Pronouns
fields.value: I think of myself as he/him, but will not get offended if you use something else.

fields.name: Work
fields.value: They call me "Tech Director". I worry about security, privacy, data, & cloud architecture.
